directions: In a large bowl, mix olive oil, butter, vegetable base, garlic, paprika, potatoes and onions.  Toss to coat.
Pour mixture into an aluminum grilling pan and place directly on grill.
Cook potatoes for 15 to 20 minutes or until fork-tender.
ingredients: 2 pounds small golden potatoes, large dice
1 tablespoon Better Than Bouillon® Seasoned Vegetable Base
title: Steakhouse Garlic Butter Potato, Pan Grill
